text: John Millman was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Ernesto Escobedo won the title after defeating Frances Tiafoe 6–2, 6–7(6–8), 7–6(7–3) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw 2016 MS Kentucky Bank Tennis Championships - Singles
title: 2016 Kentucky Bank Tennis Championships – Men's Singles
